question: Kobe Bryant, who recently died in a helicopter crash, was a legendary personality of which sports?
explanation:
Kobe Bryant was a 41- year-old American professional basketball player, who recently died in a helicopter crash near Los Angeles. Bryant played in the National Basketball Association (NBA) with the Los Angeles Lakers, throughout his entire career. He entered the NBA directly from high school and had won five NBA championships.
Bryant was on board the helicopter with eight others, including his 13-year-old daughter Gianna Bryant during the crash. The sudden demise of one of the greatest basketball players in history was mourned by basketball enthusiasts all over the world.
